trans-unit.source: Create a database in SQL Database Update V12
trans-unit.target: Create a database in SQL Database Update V12

trans-unit.source: Demonstrates how to create a database in Azure SQL Database Update V12
trans-unit.target: Demonstrates how to create a database in Azure SQL Database Update V12

trans-unit.source: Create a database in SQL Database V12
trans-unit.target: Create a database in SQL Database V12

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Sign up</linkText><title></title></link> for the SQL Database V12 <link><linkText>(Preview in some regions)</linkText><title></title></link> to take advantage of the next generation of SQL Database on Microsoft Azure.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Sign up</linkText><title></title></link> for the SQL Database V12 <link><linkText>(Preview in some regions)</linkText><title></title></link> to take advantage of the next generation of SQL Database on Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: To get started, you need a subscription for Microsoft Azure.
trans-unit.target: To get started, you need a subscription for Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: Sign up for a <link><linkText>free Azure trial</linkText><title></title></link> and review <link><linkText>pricing</linkText><title></title></link> information.
trans-unit.target: Sign up for a <link><linkText>free Azure trial</linkText><title></title></link> and review <link><linkText>pricing</linkText><title></title></link> information.

trans-unit.source: Create database
trans-unit.target: Create database

trans-unit.source: Screen shot
trans-unit.target: Screen shot

trans-unit.source: 1. Sign in to <link><linkText>http://portal.azure.com/</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: 1. Sign in to <link><linkText>http://portal.azure.com/</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>New Azure Portal</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>New Azure Portal</linkText>

trans-unit.source: 2. At the bottom of the page, on the left, click New.
trans-unit.target: 2. At the bottom of the page, on the left, click New.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Initiate New service</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Initiate New service</linkText>

trans-unit.source: 3. Click SQL database.
trans-unit.target: 3. Click SQL database.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Different services to select from</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Different services to select from</linkText>

trans-unit.source: 4. A SQL database blade opens.
trans-unit.target: 4. A SQL database blade opens.

trans-unit.source: In the Name field, specify a database name.
trans-unit.target: In the Name field, specify a database name.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Name the database</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Name the database</linkText>

trans-unit.source: 5. In SQL Database blade, click SERVER.
trans-unit.target: 5. In SQL Database blade, click SERVER.

trans-unit.source: A Server blade opens that provides two choices: either you can create a new server or use an existing server.
trans-unit.target: A Server blade opens that provides two choices: either you can create a new server or use an existing server.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>select type of server</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>select type of server</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you select Use an existing server option, select a server of your choice and click Select.
trans-unit.target: If you select Use an existing server option, select a server of your choice and click Select.

trans-unit.source: Then, complete all the actions from step 6 on wards.
trans-unit.target: Then, complete all the actions from step 6 on wards.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>select a server from the list</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>select a server from the list</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you select Create a new server, the New server blade opens.
trans-unit.target: If you select Create a new server, the New server blade opens.

trans-unit.source: Specify the server name, server admin login, and password.
trans-unit.target: Specify the server name, server admin login, and password.

trans-unit.source: Click Location to select the server location.
trans-unit.target: Click Location to select the server location.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Complete create new server options</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Complete create new server options</linkText>

trans-unit.source: 5c.The New server blade gives you the choice to create the new server with V12 updates.
trans-unit.target: 5c.The New server blade gives you the choice to create the new server with V12 updates.

trans-unit.source: To learn more about the features in V12 servers, review <link><linkText>What's new in SQL Database V12</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: To learn more about the features in V12 servers, review <link><linkText>What's new in SQL Database V12</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Select V12 server</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Select V12 server</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Make your selections on the New server blade and click OK.
trans-unit.target: Make your selections on the New server blade and click OK.

trans-unit.source: That will take you back to the SQL Database blade to complete the rest of the actions to create a database.
trans-unit.target: That will take you back to the SQL Database blade to complete the rest of the actions to create a database.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Complete New Server blade actions</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Complete New Server blade actions</linkText>

trans-unit.source: 6. Click Select Source.
trans-unit.target: 6. Click Select Source.

trans-unit.source: The different types of sources you can select from to create a database are: a blank database, a sample database or from a backup of a database.
trans-unit.target: The different types of sources you can select from to create a database are: a blank database, a sample database or from a backup of a database.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Select the source for the database</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Select the source for the database</linkText>

trans-unit.source: 7. Next, in the SQL database blade, click PRICING TIER. You can select one of the recommended pricing tier or View all available pricing tiers. After you make a choice, click Select. For more information about pricing tiers, see Upgrade SQL Database Web/Business Databases to New Service Tiers and Azure SQL Database Service Tiers and Performance Levels.
trans-unit.target: 7. Next, in the SQL database blade, click PRICING TIER. You can select one of the recommended pricing tier or View all available pricing tiers. After you make a choice, click Select. For more information about pricing tiers, see Upgrade SQL Database Web/Business Databases to New Service Tiers and Azure SQL Database Service Tiers and Performance Levels.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Select a pricing tier</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Select a pricing tier</linkText>

trans-unit.source: 8. Next, in SQL database blade, click Optional Configuration, make the selections and click OK.
trans-unit.target: 8. Next, in SQL database blade, click Optional Configuration, make the selections and click OK.

trans-unit.source: 9. When you select existing server, Resource Group and Subscription are already chosen for you.
trans-unit.target: 9. When you select existing server, Resource Group and Subscription are already chosen for you.

trans-unit.source: In the SQL database blade, you will see a locked icon next to Resource Group and Subscription.
trans-unit.target: In the SQL database blade, you will see a locked icon next to Resource Group and Subscription.

trans-unit.source: If you create a new server, then you get to select or create a resource group.
trans-unit.target: If you create a new server, then you get to select or create a resource group.

trans-unit.source: For more information, review <link><linkText>Using resource groups to manage your Azure resources.</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: For more information, review <link><linkText>Using resource groups to manage your Azure resources.</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Specify Resource group</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Specify Resource group</linkText>

trans-unit.source: 10. Click Create.
trans-unit.target: 10. Click Create.

trans-unit.source: A new database with SQL Database V12 features is created.
trans-unit.target: A new database with SQL Database V12 features is created.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Creates a new database</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Creates a new database</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Related Links
trans-unit.target: Related Links

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>What's new in SQL Database V12</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>What's new in SQL Database V12</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Plan and Prepare to Upgrade to Azure SQL Database V12</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Plan and Prepare to Upgrade to Azure SQL Database V12</linkText><title></title></link>
